resources.string: I do not have a high temperature or a new continuous cough
I have a high temperature and/or a new continuous cough
I have a confirmed diagnosis of Coronavirus (COVID-19) by the NHS
No report of any COVID-19 infection risk, symptoms or diagnosis
Potential COVID-19 infection, symptoms or confirmed diagnosis has been reported
COVID-19 is now under control, you can safely return to your normal activities
Everyone must stay at home to help stop the spread of COVID-19
Do not leave your home if you have symptoms of COVID-19 or been in prolonged close contact with someone who does
Bluetooth is unsupported on this device. This app needs Bluetooth to find other app users near you.
Location data is required to estimate your proximity to other app users. This app does not use GPS tracking and your location is never recorded or shared.
